metadata.description: Multi-agent TDD orchestration system for high-quality code generation

plugins.name: claude-orchestra
plugins.description: 12 AI agents collaborate in a hierarchical structure to enforce TDD workflow with 6-stage verification loop
features: 12 specialized AI agents (Maestro, Planner, Interviewer, etc.)
6-stage verification loop (Build, Types, Lint, Tests, Security, Diff)
